title: coin-score.ai
author: coin-score.ai
content: In my opinion, any bull market must have some narratives from which to start growing and to give people the idea that something revolutionary is happening. Probably the whales will be very interested in promoting certain narratives in the media.In your opinion, what will be the top 3 narratives from the next bull market?I would say this:The appearance of an ETF on Bitcoin;Artificial IntelligenceSocial Dexwww.coin-score.aiFundamentl analysisRanking by scoreCompare projectsPrice Predictions

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 10:11:18 AMIn your opinion, what will be the top 3 narratives from the next bull market?I would say this:The appearance of an ETF on Bitcoin;Artificial IntelligenceSocial DexBitcoin ETF is likely but don't forget that we've got the Bitcoin halving too, so that is two things for Bitcoin. I'm not sure about Artificial Intelligence, maybe it will gain some traction as it already did. About Social DEX? Decentralized social networks? They have been there before but I do no know if they'll end up the same as AIs.

comments.author: coin-score.ai
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on September 28, 2023, 10:57:09 AMQuote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 10:11:18 AMIn your opinion, what will be the top 3 narratives from the next bull market?I would say this:The appearance of an ETF on Bitcoin;Artificial IntelligenceSocial DexBitcoin ETF is likely but don't forget that we've got the Bitcoin halving too, so that is two things for Bitcoin. I'm not sure about Artificial Intelligence, maybe it will gain some traction as it already did. About Social DEX? Decentralized social networks? They have been there before but I do no know if they'll end up the same as AIs.Then maybe blockchain-based bigapps that will integrate payments with social platforms?

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 11:27:42 AM[....]Then maybe blockchain-based bigapps that will integrate payments with social platforms?Like a tipping feature or subscriptions? Maybe the payment system could be easily implemented but what's tough is getting users to the platform. I mean there have been many existing "decentralized" alternatives to Youtube but their traffic hasn't been close. They may attract some big content creators but viewers don't necessarily follow them from one app to another.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: It's already happening. Grayscale winning against the SEC is the start of it. All we need to do is wait. We all know when it comes to patience, those who support Bitcoin have the most of it.  About Artificial Intelligence. This is still being debated because there's a mass of people out there who are against it. Why? It could lead to people having fewer jobs which means more poverty in the lower sector. It will be successfully implemented but I doubt it will be a smooth one. There are always people who will be against the technology especially if it will affect their lives long term or short term.

comments.author: edmundduke
comments.body: As others pointed out it will probably be related to some big players. I have a feeling it will be also related to Blackrock - not even sure how the decentralized everything crowd will try and spin the fact that the more big money enters, the more centralized all becomes. But that is going to be the narrative, like it or not.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 11:27:42 AMQuote from: blockman on September 28, 2023, 10:57:09 AMQuote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 10:11:18 AMIn your opinion, what will be the top 3 narratives from the next bull market?I would say this:The appearance of an ETF on Bitcoin;Artificial IntelligenceSocial DexBitcoin ETF is likely but don't forget that we've got the Bitcoin halving too, so that is two things for Bitcoin. I'm not sure about Artificial Intelligence, maybe it will gain some traction as it already did. About Social DEX? Decentralized social networks? They have been there before but I do no know if they'll end up the same as AIs.Then maybe blockchain-based bigapps that will integrate payments with social platforms?Much better with that or is there really a difference with that? But it seems that we haven't seen that yet and it's integrated with crypto payments. And to be honest, with these blockchain based apps, they're having hard time to gain the traction as people don't want to try most of them. Maybe someone who's got really a big influence on this community would be helpful to do that if they ever start one. And if not, the team should be proactive and that's the toughest challenge for them to make.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 10:11:18 AMIn your opinion, what will be the top 3 narratives from the next bull market?I would say this:The appearance of an ETF on Bitcoin;Artificial IntelligenceSocial DexThe halving and the ETF will contribute a lot for the next bull run with Bitcoin.Big investors are also coming and they are making a good decision buying right now slowly but sure. The bull market is inevitable, its just a matter of time before we finally see it and if you are more bullish about Bitcoin, better to do your action now and make a good investment decision. Next year will be a great year for sure, time to make some investment now.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on September 28, 2023, 08:49:39 PMQuote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 10:11:18 AMIn your opinion, what will be the top 3 narratives from the next bull market?I would say this:The appearance of an ETF on Bitcoin;Artificial IntelligenceSocial DexThe halving and the ETF will contribute a lot for the next bull run with Bitcoin.Big investors are also coming and they are making a good decision buying right now slowly but sure. The bull market is inevitable, its just a matter of time before we finally see it and if you are more bullish about Bitcoin, better to do your action now and make a good investment decision. Next year will be a great year for sure, time to make some investment now. At this point in time the only question we have is not if there will be a bull run but how big it will be, and while we do not have an answer to that question, we do know that it is going to generate great profits for anyone that buys now, however many people out there which want to invest in this market know nothing about investing and they will only take the decision to do so once the market is already close to the top, a decision which will cause them to lose a great deal of their investment capital relatively quickly.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 10:11:18 AMIn my opinion, any bull market must have some narratives from which to start growing and to give people the idea that something revolutionary is happening. Probably the whales will be very interested in promoting certain narratives in the media.In your opinion, what will be the top 3 narratives from the next bull market?I would say this:The appearance of an ETF on Bitcoin;Artificial IntelligenceSocial DexAs much as I want that Bitcoin ETF to be approved, I think it will be a huge thing as well if a spot Ethereum ETF will have its way as well. I think we've seen the huge upside of Artificial Intelligence already but I think it has still more rooms considering this is an ongoing narrative. I think DeFi shouldn't be left behind, this will be a huge catalyst now that banks are diving into the world of cryptocurrency.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on September 28, 2023, 08:49:39 PMQuote from: coin-score.ai on September 28, 2023, 10:11:18 AMIn your opinion, what will be the top 3 narratives from the next bull market?I would say this:The appearance of an ETF on Bitcoin;Artificial IntelligenceSocial DexThe halving and the ETF will contribute a lot for the next bull run with Bitcoin.Big investors are also coming and they are making a good decision buying right now slowly but sure. The bull market is inevitable, its just a matter of time before we finally see it and if you are more bullish about Bitcoin, better to do your action now and make a good investment decision. Next year will be a great year for sure, time to make some investment now. Bull market will surely come, many are already saw this coming and many are doing their part, while some are still focus on the dumped price of the market and panicking which I think is not a good strategy. If you’re into Bitcoin, you should be more proud about your investments and give it a year I’m sure you can have the profit by that time. Yes, halving will still be a big thing and the effect of that usually start after the actual halving, so next year is indeed a great year for the market.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: We don't know for sure the ETF ones might be promising narrative for bitcoin in the future, but the artificial intelligence not so much.mainly because even right now AI isn't really having that massive supporters, instead this field already being acquired by those companies and corporations that tryingdelving into AI and they have success big time.I just think that we haven't seen any meaningful innovations right now, after all its always unpredictable narrative like in previous bullrun where blockchain gaming and institutional investors suddenly flock onto cryptocurrency ecosystem out of the blue.

comments.author: Teraboy
comments.body: Artificial Intelligence if getting taken advantage of properly it would be massive I think when it comes to the next bullrun, we see by our own eyes how revolutionizing these AI fields are quite literally it disrupt almost every field out there.I think if blockchain could somehow give project utilizing the power of AI that could cause massive adoption then it will bring about the next bullrun but we'll see whether the narrative would be AI or different thing.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: 2017 bull run we had ICO’s, in the last bull run we had NFT’s. I think bitcoin spot etf approvals will ignite the next bull market but there will be some lesser known tech or innovation that will be like the ico & nft craze. I suggest it will be something AI related but I don’t know what it will be yet.

comments.author: VFalcon
comments.body: It's not worth guessing what they'll say and it's clear that the main thing is to wait it out and we'll get ours. I have already bought BTC and TFS at the bottom and am just waiting for another upswing

comments.author: krava22
comments.body: Quote from: VFalcon on September 30, 2023, 05:55:23 AMIt's not worth guessing what they'll say and it's clear that the main thing is to wait it out and we'll get ours. I have already bought BTC and TFS at the bottom and am just waiting for another upswing In fact, that's what you should do, now you should not change your strategy abruptly, it's better to wait with your tokens in your pocket until it gets heavy

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: In my opinion, I think the main possible catalyst (or narrative you say) would be the Bitcoin halving. But I am afraid that despite that this is going to be what we are waiting these days, there would be not much hype anymore like what Elon Musk did for most of 2021. Even if those Bitcoin and Ethereum spot ETF applications are going to be approved by SEC, the price of Bitcoin realistically may not going to gain that much. Like XRP’s case for example. They’ve partially won against SEC, so the market pumped and BTC rose to as much as $31k+ before slowly correcting all the way back to $25k to $26k range. The bulls did not hold that price for long as there is not much noise or hype after that XRP and SEC news. So it would be really difficult to know about those narratives that may come out of nowhere to impact the market to go on a bull run, in which we do not know when will it happen as well.

comments.author: Cadaver20
comments.body: It is difficult for common people like me to guess what will be the narratives that will ignite the crypto market and initiate the next bullrun. But currently I see more and more AI related news on various social media. This AI can be the next narratives.Quote from: VFalcon on September 30, 2023, 05:55:23 AMIt's not worth guessing what they'll say and it's clear that the main thing is to wait it out and we'll get ours. I have already bought BTC and TFS at the bottom and am just waiting for another upswing The name TFS coin is new to me.  Better if you buy BTC, ETH and BNB.

comments.author: rojan
comments.body: Quote from: Johnyz on September 28, 2023, 09:24:06 PMBull market will surely come, many are already saw this coming and many are doing their part, while some are still focus on the dumped price of the market and panicking which I think is not a good strategy. If you’re into Bitcoin, you should be more proud about your investments and give it a year I’m sure you can have the profit by that time. Yes, halving will still be a big thing and the effect of that usually start after the actual halving, so next year is indeed a great year for the market.I'm waiting for the bull market to come. Because I've invested in altcoins including bitcoin, so I'm waiting now. I don't worry about investing in bitcoin because I have no chance of losing money, so I'm in bitcoin for a long time.  Like to invest. Hope the market may be better in the first quarter of next year. For those who have invested now, I see no other option but to wait.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: ETFs are a speculative theme for a possible bitcoin bump. The cryptocurrency narratives for the next bull run will of course consist of the artificial intelligence theme, and various L0 networks, L2 and L3 networks will also proliferate. Also the topic with modular blockchains is now starting to gain momentum, and the DeFi NFT topic may also be hyped.
